revised_title: Quantitative Analysis of Metals in Solution Using Spark Spectra
tldr: The authors developed a method for accurately estimating the concentration of metals in solution using spark spectra. They created a sparking vessel that allowed for a steady flow of liquid and a spark between two liquids, which produced a spectrum representative of the bulk solution. They also introduced the use of an internal standard to account for variations in exposure and electrical conditions, allowing for more accurate quantitative analysis.
